about_the_game:
Step into a transcendent journey with Above & Beyond. Take a dip into 6 captivating new Trips, or fully immerse yourself in a continuous 30-minute rave-like experience - an electrifying, exclusive feature of this Expansion.

This expansion includes the following essential Above & Beyond tracks, each with beautiful new environments and available in Beginner, Regular, Expert, and Cardio levels:

  • Above & Beyond - Blue Sky Action feat. Alex Vargas

  • Above & Beyond - Crazy Love feat. Zoë Johnston

  • Above & Beyond - Happiness Amplified feat. Richard Bedford

  • Above & Beyond - Hello 

  • Above & Beyond & Seven Lions - See The End feat. Opposite The Other

  • Above & Beyond - Sun & Moon feat. Richard Bedford

This pack also offers you the opportunity to experience all of these tracks in a new continuous 30-minute mix, expertly crafted for you by Above & Beyond’s record label, Anjunabeats, paired with the choreography Trippers know and love by Coopalooper, this pack enhances your dance. Available for the first time in Audio Trip, explore an entirely new way of experiencing classic beats from Above & Beyond.

Let yourself be enveloped by the vibrant environments that come alive, as lights dance and swirl around you in perfect harmony with sound and space. 

Let the intoxicating rhythms of Above & Beyond take you on a mesmerizing trip.

About Above & Beyond: 

Above & Beyond have been at the forefront of electronic dance music for more than two decades. Founders of the iconic Anjunabeats and Anjunadeep record labels, and hosts of a weekly radio show that reaches millions of dance lovers around the world, the trio have earned two GRAMMY nominations and have played sold-out shows at historic venues like Madison Square Garden NYC, The Hollywood Bowl, Royal Albert Hall London, and Red Rocks Amphitheater.

short_description: Step into a transcendent journey with Above & Beyond. Immerse yourself in six captivating tracks, or allow yourself to be transported by the all-new continuous 30-minute mix—an immersive feature exclusive to this Expansion! Let the intoxicating rhythms take you Above & Beyond.
